General.Name: OCB Bhd
General.Description: OCB Berhad, an investment holding company, operates in the instant noodle, mattresses manufacturing, and building materials supply businesses. It operates through Consumer foods, Bedding Products, Building Materials, Property Development, and Others segments. The company provides instant noodles under the IBUMIE and Baa..gus brands; mayonnaise, salad dressings, seasoning-powders, seasoning-oils, sauces, spices, soups, stocks, marinades, canned tuna, and food ingredients under the TELLY brand. It also manufactures and distributes innerspring coils, natural latex and foam-fiber mattress systems, divan-foundations, headboards, and bedding accessories under the KING KOIL, FIRST KNIGHT, and WONDERCOIL brands. In addition, the company supplies building products, such as sanitary wares and bathroom fittings under the ROCA, ARMITAGE SHANKS, DURAVIT, JOHNSON SUISSE, SLOAN, BOBRICK, HANSGROHE, PRESTO, HEWI, GEBERIT, JOMOO, and IDEAL STANDARD brands; locks and ironmongeries, floor boards, door frames, and door leaves under the LOKRITE, SAMSUNG, HUSKEY, GEZE, EZ-SET, KWIKSET, GROOM, YALIS, BALDWIN, and ROBINA brands; and health related products under the AERUS and BREATHAIR brands for the construction of houses, hotels, laboratories, and medical institutions. Further, it is involved in the property holding, investment, and development activities; and buying, selling, and fabricating spare parts and equipment. The company operates in Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore, Brunei, the United States, and internationally. OCB Berhad was incorporated in 1959 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
